review: live in uk, bought 4 fire sticks for myself and family on recent visit to usa as fire stick not available in uk, already have fire tv so saw this as a cheaper version of a similar product. does not work in uk for anything except a few games so pretty useless. bought at bestbuy over the counter. had phone help from tech support who just advised nothing could be done and no refund or compensatory amazon vouchers could be issued as i didnt buy it direct from them, why should it matter, it is clearly an amazon product. why shouldnt it work in uk when fire tv works wherever you are so long as you tell the fire tv box where you are geographically........ $160 down the drain with no help from amazon. disappointing service given that i have been happy with the 2 kindles and the fire tv i already own and countless amazon purchases and general service in the past.
